pullRequest.body:
Split from #13385; this excludes usages where `refine'` was used to replace `refine_struct` â€“ except where the proofs for each field were already separately written out.

nodes.body:
Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/e457fb44-fa07-4bf3-a892-ffd45060ed03) for commit 9dba1e1922249d79ce912c1bd647162891d087b0.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/e586d746-73c6-417e-a942-dc8e31f6a635/to/e457fb44-fa07-4bf3-a892-ffd45060ed03) against commit 52b851a92cd69484ad35eae796b7f5a99e9c3fba.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/bd78be3f-1315-4af1-8fb1-db77a1284ece) for commit c3c66d3ef8ce79a24896f04be89d75260c8190c9.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/e586d746-73c6-417e-a942-dc8e31f6a635/to/bd78be3f-1315-4af1-8fb1-db77a1284ece) against commit 52b851a92cd69484ad35eae796b7f5a99e9c3fba.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9355076044/job/25749417496)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9355076044/job/25749416941)

Looks good to me, thanks!

Here is a summary of the non-`refine'`-to-`refine` changes:
* a couple of `convert`s in `LinearAlgebra`,
* a few scattered `apply`s (I'm not a big fan of `apply` with more than one side-goal, but this is a separate issue),
* some `exact`s -- this is a potential performance issue, but `!bench` does not highlight anything in particular,
* some removed porting notes.

Overall, this is an improvement, in my opinion!

* some removed porting notes.

Overall, this is an improvement, in my opinion!

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/e457fb44-fa07-4bf3-a892-ffd45060ed03) for commit 9dba1e1922249d79ce912c1bd647162891d087b0.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/e586d746-73c6-417e-a942-dc8e31f6a635/to/e457fb44-fa07-4bf3-a892-ffd45060ed03) against commit 52b851a92cd69484ad35eae796b7f5a99e9c3fba.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/bd78be3f-1315-4af1-8fb1-db77a1284ece) for commit c3c66d3ef8ce79a24896f04be89d75260c8190c9.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/e586d746-73c6-417e-a942-dc8e31f6a635/to/bd78be3f-1315-4af1-8fb1-db77a1284ece) against commit 52b851a92cd69484ad35eae796b7f5a99e9c3fba.

Looks good to me, thanks!

Here is a summary of the non-`refine'`-to-`refine` changes:
* a couple of `convert`s in `LinearAlgebra`,
* a few scattered `apply`s (I'm not a big fan of `apply` with more than one side-goal, but this is a separate issue),
* some `exact`s -- this is a potential performance issue, but `!bench` does not highlight anything in particular,
* some removed porting notes.

Overall, this is an improvement, in my opinion!
